example.content: interface FastEthernet0/0 description ubi-external ip address 10.30.18.245 255.255.254.0 ip access-group NETCELO_FROM_INTERNET in no ip proxy-arp ip nat outside ip inspect NETCELO_FW in ip virtual-reassembly no ip route-cache cef no ip mroute-cache duplex auto speed auto
